description:
Jake Russell is a scientist and a member of thehttp://anidb.net/ch32498 [ Black Order]. He`s also http://anidb.net/ch32516 [Jean]`s father. He appeared for the first time when http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen] came to him in order to ask him to stop his son, Jean, from patrolling the city, looking for Akuma.
Later on, he was seen by http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Komui Lee] while talking to http://anidb.net/ch7123 [Lenalee]. Komui immediately suspected that they started dating, even more when he found out that they took the same day off. The truth was that they were helping each other choose a present for Komui, in Lenalee`s case, and Jean, in Russell`s.
name: Jake Russell
